instructions.es: En la rotonda siga cerrada a la derecha
instructions.es-ES: En la rotonda siga cerrada a la derecha
instructions.fr: Au rond-point, tourner franchement à droite
instructions.pl: Na rondzie weź ostro w prawo
instructions.pt-BR: Na rotatória, vire fechada à direita
instructions.ro: La sensul giratoriu virați brusc dreapta
instructions.tr: Göbekli kavşakta keskin sağ yöne dön
